tasks.label: Compile Argos Examples
tasks.detail: Clone and compile argos examples in workspace folder
command: mkdir build && cd build && cmake -GNinja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && ninja

tasks.label: Build Argos3
command: if test -d build_simulator; then rm -r build_simulator; fi &&
mkdir build_simulator && cd build_simulator && cmake -GNinja ../src -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DARGOS_BUILD_FOR=simulator -DARGOS_THREADSAFE_LOG=ON -DARGOS_DYNAMIC_LOADING=ON && ninja

tasks.label: Post install Argos3 script
tasks.detail: Run argos3 post install script repo from source
